Necropolis

The Necropolis is one of the special branch dungeons in Remixed Pixel Dungeon, focused on undead-themed content.

Overview

The Necropolis is accessed from depth 7 of the main dungeon (Prison level) via a special exit that appears in the level. It consists of 4 regular levels (necro1-necro4) and a boss level (necro5). It features unique undead enemies and mechanics related to death and necromancy.

Access

To access the Necropolis, players must reach depth 7 (Prison level) where a Necromancer NPC will spawn (unless the player is playing as the Necromancer class) and give the player a Skeleton Key. The Necropolis entrance appears as a locked exit on the Prison level (depth 7).

Levels

  • necro1 (depth 8) - Entry level with basic undead creatures
  • necro2 (depth 9) - More challenging undead with some elite enemies
  • necro3 (depth 10) - Advanced undead enemies and mechanics
  • necro4 (depth 11) - Most challenging regular area
  • necro5 (depth 12) - Boss level with the Lich as the final encounter

Enemies

The Necropolis contains unique undead enemies not found elsewhere in the dungeon:

  • Zombie
  • Skeleton
  • Enslaved Soul
  • Exploding Skull
  • Death Knight
  • Dread Knight
  • Lich (boss)
  • Runic Skull (boss component)

Items and Rewards

  • Black Skull of Mastery - Dropped by the Lich boss, required to become a Lich subclass
  • Soul Reaper - Special artifact for Necromancer class, dropped by the Lich boss
  • Blade of Souls - Special weapon found in the Necropolis
  • Jar of Souls - Spawns on each Necropolis level

Strategy

The Necropolis requires preparation for undead-specific challenges. Many undead enemies have resistances to common damage types and may require specialized equipment or tactics to defeat effectively. The Necromancer class has significant advantages when exploring this area due to their natural affinity with undead creatures.
